summary: Dr. Hadi M. Rassael, D.O. faced charges of sexual misconduct with multiple patients, unethical financial dealings, and operating an unaccredited facility, leading to an 18-month license suspension in 2015. On May 25, 2016, his petition to terminate the suspension was denied, with the suspension continuing until he meets specific conditions, after which he will serve a minimum three-year probation with terms including chaperone requirements and MPRP compliance.
